subclusters.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS production, antioxidant defenses, and mitochondrial dysfunction as central to aging.
Emphasizes ROS from metabolism, antioxidant enzyme mimetics, and mitochondrial oxidative damage driving aging.
Describes ROS imbalance, oxidative damage accumulation, and cellular senescence linked to mitochondrial ROS.
Highlights ROS molecular damage, redox signaling disruption, and musculoskeletal aging linked to mitochondrial ROS.
Details mitochondrial respiration as antioxidant defense and ROS regulation affecting cell fate and aging.
Focuses on mitochondrial dysfunction as ROS source, oxidative damage, and neurodegenerative aging.
Links mitochondrial ROS production, antioxidant defenses, and vascular aging in species with different longevity.
Describes ROS accumulation from mitochondria, SOD enzyme roles, and tissue degeneration driving aging.
Focuses on glutathione antioxidant system, mitochondrial ROS detoxification, and lifespan extension.
Connects metabolic rate, mitochondrial ROS production, selective protein oxidation, and aging rate.
Describes mitochondrial ROS production, proton leak, oxidative damage, and caloric restriction effects on aging.
Focuses on mitochondrial ROS causing protein oxidation correlating with lifespan across species.
Shows reduced mitochondrial ROS production and oxidative damage correlating with exceptional longevity.
Highlights catalase antioxidant defense reducing mitochondrial ROS and cardiac aging.
Proposes an optimum mitochondrial superoxide level regulated by Mn SOD affecting oxidative stress and aging.
Mitohormesis theory where mitochondrial ROS act as signaling molecules inducing protective stress responses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Depletion by Oxygen Radicals Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxygen radical damage causing stem cell loss and decline in tissue regenerative capacity.
Links oxidative damage accelerating telomere shortening, triggering cellular senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes genetic variation in oxidative stress resistance and lifespan, with antioxidant rescue effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes oxidative damage as a public aging mechanism with evolutionary variability and stress resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes genetic correlation between oxidative stress resistance and reproductive lifespan in birds.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows antioxidant enzyme activity influencing aging rate and lifespan extension by dietary restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Examines antioxidant enzyme expression and oxidative damage accumulation in long-lived honeybees.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Variation and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses antioxidant supplementation effects on lifespan modulated by genotype and environment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress to high blood pressure pathology via redox imbalance, fibrogenesis, and ion pump inhibition.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on xanthine oxidoreductase-derived ROS causing cardiovascular oxidative damage and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative damage accumulation impairing cardiac sarcoplasmic reticulum function and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details oxidative stress causing membrane lipid peroxidation and synaptic plasticity impairment in hippocampus.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains neuronal vulnerability in Alzheimer's due to intrinsic and systemic oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress to brain aging and dementia, modulated by antioxidants and lipid metabolism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Pathology and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress involvement in Werner syndrome phenotype via DNA repair and redox pathways.
Focuses on hydroxyl radical as primary oxidative agent and melatonin as scavenger in aging.
Describes oxidative glycation, AGE formation, and free radical production contributing to aging and diabetic complications.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxygen Diffusion Barrier and Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes age-related oxygen diffusion barrier in liver cells causing oxidative stress and metabolic impairment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lipid Homeostasis and Proteostasis Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oleic acid-induced SKN-1A activation linking lipid metabolism, proteostasis, and aging regulation.
